name: ice-burn
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The turn after using this move, the user surrounds the target with an ultracold, freezing wind to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.
